rowprovider.param: SELECT [gi_txtUDS] ,convert(int,p.partnerid) _partnerid ,isnull (CONVERT(varchar, convert(int,p.partnerid)), 'UDS' + gi.[gi_txtUDS]) as pkey ,'2000' as ry_lngReportingYear, 'Contact' as Role ,UPPER([gi_txtContact]) gi_txtContact ,SUBSTRING( REPLACE( REPLACE(UPPER([gi_txtContact]),' ',''),'.','') ,1 ,6) as namekey ,[gi_txtContactAddress] ,[gi_txtContactOtherAddress] ,[gi_txtContactCity] ,[gi_txtContactState] ,[gi_txtContactZipCode] ,[gi_txtContactPhone] ,[gi_txtContactFax] ,[gi_txtContactEmail] FROM [HRSA_UDS_2000].[dbo].[tblGranteeInfo] gi left outer join InformationExplorer.dbo.Partner p on gi.[gi_txtUDS]=p.UDSGranteeID where [gi_txtContact] is not null and LEN([gi_txtContact]) > 0
